### **Who You Are**

**We believe you have**

* At least 3 years of **hands-on** relevant experience in a similar position.
* Proven track record in running successful account-based marketing and demand generation campaigns from planning to execution.
* Results-driven and highly analytical mindset.
* Excellent communication and problem-solving skills.
* Proactive and 'can do' attitude with attention to detail.
* Comfort in hosting events and webinars, both in-person and virtual.
* Experience working with CRM and marketing automation tools such as HubSpot.
* Experience in a fast-paced SaaS organization is preferred.
* Fluency in Finnish, Swedish, and English, with outstanding verbal and written skills.
* Living in Sweden (visiting our Stockholm office is required on a weekly basis).

### **Why Frends?**

* **Innovative Environment:** Be part of a forward-thinking company with a strong focus on innovation.
* **Professional Growth:** Opportunities for continuous learning and professional development.
* **Collaborative Culture:** Work in a supportive team with a flat hierarchy.
* **Exciting Role:** Engage in a role that allows you to develop your skills and impact our growth journey.
* **Flexible Work Mode:** Enjoy flexible working times and hybrid work options
* **Competitive Benefits:** Receive a competitive salary and wide-ranging employee benefits.

### **Interested in joining us?**

If you want to impact and join our growth journey, please contact us and let us know more about you!

 **Additional information**

* You will report to the Chief Marketing Officer based in our Stockholm office.
* The role will be filled as soon as the right person is found.
* Our recruitment process includes three to four phone and Teams discussions with our recruiter, CMO, regional leaders, and team members to ensure a smooth and informative process for you.

###  **Want to know more about Frends?**

**Frends** eiPaaS is our own, Nordic, modern, low-code integration platform. Frends solves the digitalization challenges of both global and smaller **customers** and in both private and public sectors in various industries. As a brand Frends is over 30 years old but the recent rise of iPaaS Frends has seen explosive growth in the Nordic and Europe markets. It has been and is constantly being developed by our own R&D team. The latest incarnation of the product utilizes modern technologies and cloud services.


**Frends** is recognized in the **Gartner** **Magic Quadrant** for Integration Platform as a Service, Worldwide. Frends was also awarded in **G2 review** with the "Fastest Implementation" badge in 2023.


Visit our webpage. Check out our use cases. Listen to our webinars. Learn more about Frendszone from our blogs.

title: Software Test Engineer
description:
**Everything we do starts with people****.**


Our human-centric focus is what makes us different from all other car companies, and it’s at the heart of everything we create. If you want to join us in our mission to make people’s lives less complicated, we offer you a chance to grow together with talented people who want to make a true difference.

  



Connected Experience unit within Software Engineering includes Connectivity and Car Cloud Platform, Infotainment Platform, Applications and Data & Diagnostics. Our vision and strategy are to maximize the attractiveness of owning and using a Volvo, make all cars connected and provide a continuously enhanced experience for both new and existing cars. The ART Connectivity Platform is responsible for delivering Global Connectivity as a service – E2E including SW, Assistance Call and Mobile Network Services. The platform we provide is the prerequisite for all connected applications and services within the vehicle.

  


**What you’ll do**


Your purpose as a test engineer, together with your colleagues in your agile team and the product owner, is to provide stepwise (business) value to the larger solutions/systems (via the Agile Release Train - ART). You will create, develop, maintain both manual and automated test procedures for assistance call(bCall) and eCall applications. You will plan, execute tests, analyse results, report issues and anomalies during the entire software development lifecycle. We also expect you to be on top of technology evolution and provide innovative ideas to continuously improve the product and our processes.

  


The product purpose is to enable assistance call services such as eCall and bCall for all cars delivered by Volvo Cars. Your focus is to secure and own the end-to-end responsibility making sure our customers get the best possible system with regards to functionality and quality.

  


 **What you’ll bring**


For you to fully enjoy this opportunity, we believe that you are a motivated, self-going test engineer that have experience in the field. You embrace teamwork, collaboration and are eager to learn and develop new competences. Experience from working in the automotive or telecom industry is a clear advantage to succeed in this role.


We see that you have a BSc degree or higher in Software Engineering or equivalent experience. +3 years of test methodologies like System, Integration and Component testing, strong communication skills and European driver license B. In addition, you will need experience and competence in the following tech;


* Development of Test Automation frameworks (both on Windows and Linux)
* CI/CD tools (Git bash, Git, Gerrit, Jenkins)
* Python
* HIL testing
* Automotive experience

  




Meritorious competence and experience;


* Linux
* Communication protocols: CAN, Flexray, LIN, Ethernet
* Experience in automotive Vector tools like CANoe/CANalyser
* Embedded C/C++

  




**Want to know more? We hope so**

  


Does this sound like your next challenge? Welcome with your application by submitting your resume and cover letter via the link below no later than 15th September2024**,** however incoming applications will be reviewed on an ongoing basis, so please apply as soon as possible!

  


For questions regarding the recruitment process, contact recruiter malgorzata.dziczek@volvocars.com. Please note that due to GDPR we do not accept any applications via email.

  


**Who are we?**


Everything we do starts with people. Our purpose is to provide freedom to move, in a personal, sustainable and safe way. We are committed to simplifying our customers’ lives by offering better technology solutions that improve their impact on the world and bringing the most advanced mobility innovations to protect them, their loved ones and the people around them.

  

  

Volvo Cars’ continued success is the result of a collaborative, diverse, and inclusive working environment. The people of Volvo Cars are committed to making a difference in our world. Today, we are one of the most well-known and respected car brands, with over 40,000 employees across the globe. We believe in bringing out the best in each other and harnessing the true power of people. At Volvo Cars your career is designed around your talents and aspirations so you can reach your full potential. Join us on a journey of a lifetime as we create safety, autonomous driving and electrification technologies of tomorrow.
company_description: At Volvo Car Group, our vision is clear: "To be the world's most progressive and desired premium car brand".

title: Cyber Security Consultant
description:
**Job Title: Senior Information Security Consultant** 




 We are seeking a Senior Information Security Consultant with deep expertise in information security principles and practices. The ideal candidate will have experience with industry regulations and standards such as NIS2, CER, CIS, and ISO 27000, along with a proven ability to conduct risk analysis, security assessments, and provide strategic consultation. Strong communication skills are essential for effective collaboration with customers and stakeholders. Preferred certifications include CISSP, CISA, or CISM.
 



  





**Key Responsibilities:** 



* Perform security assessments and risk analysis
* Provide strategic security consultation
* Collaborate with customers and stakeholders on security practices and solutions



  





**Qualifications:** 



* Extensive knowledge of information security standards and regulations (NIS2, CER, CIS, ISO 27000)
* Strong communication and consultation skills
* Preferred certifications: CISSP, CISA, CISM

title: IT-Arkitekt till Reitan Convenience Sweden
description:
Som IT-Arkitekt hos Reitan Convenience Sweden (RCS) har du en nyckelroll i att leda arbetet med IT-arkitektur hos de två största varumärkena i koncernen, vilka är Pressbyrån och 7-Eleven. RCS är franchisegivare för cirka 400 butiker som drivs av framgångsrika köpmän där din roll är att vidareutveckla IT-arkitekturen och se till så att den stödjer verksamhetens tekniska behov nu och i framtiden. Ta chansen och sök, urval görs löpande!
 



  

**Företag :**
 Reitan Convenience Sweden AB
 



  

**Plats :**
 Stockholm
 



  

**Jobbkategori :**
 Teknik
 



  

**Omfattning :**
 Heltid, Heltid
 



  

**Startdatum :**
 Enligt överenskommelse
 



  

**Typ av uppdrag :**
 Rekrytering
   




**Om tjänsten**

 På Reitan Convenience Sveriges servicekontor gör vi allt för att underlätta för franchisetagarna i deras arbete ute i våra butiker. Vi är starkt värderingsstyrda där omtänksamhet och att bry som om varandra är en självklarhet för oss. På vårt nybyggda servicekontor är vi ca 115 medarbetare uppdelade på avdelningarna: Sälj, Marknad & Inköp, HR & Hållbarhet, IT, Bygg & Etablering, Ekonomi, Affärsutveckling och Data Analys. Vi är stolta över vårt hållbarhetsarbete som du kan läsa mer om här .
 


  


  

**Du erbjuds**



  

  
* Att vara
   

**en viktig spelare i företagets förändringsresa**
 mot att använda teknologi för att förbättra affären, där du får stor frihet att förverkliga dina idéer och driva din agenda framåt, på det sätt du tror blir bäst.
  
* Goda
   

**möjligheter att påverka**
 i en bred och platt organisation.
  
* Goda förmåner och ett arbete där
   

**balans mellan arbete och privatliv**
 värdesätts. Exempelvis genom sommartid maj- september, friskvårdsbidrag, friskvårdstimme samt andra förmåner.
  

  


**Arbetsuppgifter**
  
* Äga ansvaret för den övergripande arkitekturen och de ändringar som behövs för att optimera arkitekturen utifrån verksamhetens behov
  
* Guida och styra interna utvecklingsteam i att arbeta i enlighet med övergripande arkitektur
  
* Agera rådgivare avseende arkitektur till övriga IT- och affärsfunktioner
  
* Samarbeta med övriga delar inom Reitan Retail
  
* Dela med dig av nya utvecklingsinitiativ, planera och estimera resurser, samt stötta projekt för att genomföra dessa initiativ
  
* Hantera teknisk roadmap för olika verksamhetsområden
  

  


**Vi söker dig som**
  
* Har flerårig arbetslivserfarenhet inom applikationsutveckling
  
* Har erfarenhet av att leda och stötta utvecklare
  
* Dokumenterad erfarenhet från att designa och implementera teknisk arkitektur utifrån verksamhetsbehov
  
* Har en eftergymnasial utbildning inom områden som systemutveckling, datorteknik eller motsvarande
  
* Har erfarenhet av att jobba med Google Cloud Platform eller annan liknande molnplattform
  
* Har bred förståelse av att jobba agilt, exempelvis enligt DevOps metodik
  
* Har erfarenhet från retailbolag och en förståelse för affärsområdet
  
* Talar och skriver flytande på svenska och engelska då du använder båda språken i ditt dagliga arbete
   

  

**För att lyckas i rollen har du följande personliga egenskaper:**
  
* Strukturerad
  
* Problemlösande
  
* Affärsinriktad
  


  


  

**Information om rekryteringsprocessen:**



  

  
* Telefonintervju med Academic Work
  
* Personlighets- och problemlösningstester
  
* Djupintervju med Academic Work
  
* Intervjuer + case med RCS
  
* Bakgrundskontroll och referenstagning
  


  

  

**Vår rekryteringsprocess**
  


 Denna rekryteringsprocess hanteras av Academic Work och vår kunds önskemål är att alla frågor rörande tjänsten skickas till Academic Work och ansvarig rekryterare Jessica Billquist, jessica.billquist@academicwork.se eller rekryteringskoordinator Minna Loosaar, minna.loosaar@academicwork.se.
 


  


 Vi tillämpar löpande urval och annonsen kan därmed komma att tas ned innan sista ansökningsdag om det är så att vi har gått vidare till urvals- och intervjufas. Rekryteringsprocessen innehåller två urvalstest: ett personlighetstest och ett test i kognitiv förmåga. Testerna är ett verktyg för att kunna hitta den kandidat med högst potential för tjänsten samt främja jämlikhet, mångfald och en rättvis rekryteringsprocess.
   




**Reitan Convenience Sweden AB**

 Läs mer om RCS här !
   




**Bli direktrekryterad till Reitan Convenience Sweden AB**

 Detta är en direktrekrytering, vilket betyder att den kandidat som får tjänsten blir direktanställd av kundföretaget. Rekryteringsprocessen hanteras av Academic Work.
   




**Har du frågor om tjänsten?**

 Mikaela Hofstedt eller någon av kollegorna i rekryteringsteamet svarar dig gärna på stv3@academicwork.se Ange annons-ID i ditt mail: 15100365

title: Associate Solution Consultant
description:
Benify is an international HR tech company that provides a market-leading global benefits and total rewards platform. With over 500 Benifyers in 6 countries, we're driving success with over 1,500 customers and about two million users around the world.🌍 We empower people to be the best they can be, while fostering a sustainable and engaging work culture where employees feel engaged and included.
   

  

 Our team of Solution Consultants is growing!
   

  

**About The Role**
 The Solution Consultant plays a critical role in the success of any project. They act as a bridge between the client and the internal technical team. They are responsible for engaging with clients and providers alike to gather all relevant requirements needed to design a Benify best practice solution. The design process is a collaborative effort which the Solution Consultant coordinates within the cross-functional project team. Subsequently, it is the Solution Consultant's responsibility to guide the client and provider to the Benify best practice solution.
   

  

 The role involves acting as a subject matter expert on benefits technology and, thereby the benefits market. The Solution Consultant will from time to time be expected to participate in sales opportunities, educate others internally, and be a stakeholder in product development initiatives. Please note, this a junior role.
   

  

**As a Solution Consultant, You Will**
* Lead calls with clients and benefit providers
* Review requirement specifications
* Guide the internal solution design process within your project team
* Document agreed solutions in our Functional Design specifications
* Create and manage Jira tickets and take part in sprint planning
* Support the build and test process until the solution is fully rolled out.


**And You Will Do This By**
* Building and maintaining good working relations with internal stakeholders, clients, and suppliers
* Becoming the client’s trusted advisor
* Taking ownership of the solution being delivered
* Thinking logically around end-to-end process workflows
* Adhering to Benify best practice solution design.


**Do we have you on the hook yet? Great!** 
**Here's what we are looking for:**
**Required**
* Experience working with technical implementation projects
* Enjoy problem-solving, working in teams, and taking initiative


**Desirable**
* Experience implementing large complex multi-national client-facing technology projects
* Benefits experience from either working for a benefits tech company, implementing benefits tech within your organisation, being a tech-savvy individual in the benefits sector, or a benefits professional within the tech industry (e.g. within a SaaS company or tech startup)


 Join a dynamic and innovative SaaS company dedicated to helping employers improve their relationships with employees worldwide. As a Benifyer, you'll enjoy a forward-thinking culture that encourages personal and professional growth. We offer an entrepreneurial environment that values creativity and new ideas, with a commitment to diversity and inclusion. With a nearly gender-balanced team, we prioritize creating a supportive workplace where everyone can thrive.
   

  

 Location: Stockholm, Sweden
   

  

 We look forward to reading your application!
   

  

 Interested, but not right now? Register your interest here and be notified when we are hiring: https://career.benify.com/connect
   

  

*Please let us know if you need any reasonable adjustments for interviews by replying to the email you will receive after you apply.*
 Benify started in 2004 in Sweden with a goal to revolutionize the HR industry with a platform that would improve the lives of employees. Today, Benify is an independent, flexible, and agile global HR technology company, offering the market’s leading global benefits and total rewards platform.

title: Enterprise Account Executive, IgniteTech (Remote) - $100,000/year USD
description:
Crossover is the world's #1 source of full-time remote jobs. Our clients offer top-tier pay for top-tier talent. We're recruiting this role for our client, IgniteTech. Have you got what it takes?
   

  

 The sales industry is drowning in inefficiency, yet ripe for disruption. At IgniteTech, we're not just tweaking systems; we're overhauling the sales process with advanced AI tools that change the game. Our AI-enhanced execution and predictive forecasting are not just about improvement but transformation, boosting sales efficiency and effectiveness dramatically.
   

  

 In this role, you'll wield cutting-edge generative AI to not only enhance real-time sales executions but also steer long-term market forecasting. Imagine deploying AI that provides instant, deep insights during live customer interactions, or forecasting models that predict market shifts with stunning accuracy. Here, your work will directly increase sales conversions and ensure that our forecasts hit the mark, recalibrating in real time as the market evolves.
   

  

 You will also integrate into a team where your efforts reshape our overarching business landscape. Your day-to-day will involve leveraging AI to streamline current sales processes and articulating complex AI benefits to non-technical stakeholders. This position is crafted for someone who thrives under pressure, loves a challenge, and is eager to push boundaries in AI and sales.
   

  

 If the prospect of leading such transformative initiatives excites you, IgniteTech is your stage. This is where you can make a significant impact, leading the charge in AI-driven sales innovation. Ready to lead the future of B2B sales with groundbreaking AI? Apply now and join us in setting new industry standards at IgniteTech.
   

  

**What You Will Be Doing**
* AI-Enhanced Sales Execution: Direct application of GenAI technologies to facilitate and enhance the day-to-day execution of sales activities.
* Advanced Sales Forecasting and Market Analysis: Oversee advanced analytics projects that use AI to forecast long-term market trends and sales performance.
* Drive AI Adoption: Lead initiatives to deploy AI-driven tools that assist sales teams in real-time during customer interactions and sales negotiations.


**Enterprise Account Executive Key Responsibilities**
* Drive significant improvements in sales efficiency and effectiveness through the development and implementation of AI-driven sales tools.


**Basic Requirements**
* Professional experience leveraging multiple LLMs (ChatGPT, Gemini, Claude, etc.) and AI tools to automate manual tasks and boost your company's productivity (if you've only ever used ChatGPT, that's probably not enough)
* At least 3 years of experience in B2B software sales


**About IgniteTech**
 If you want to work hard at a company where you can grow and be a part of a dynamic team, join IgniteTech!
   

  

 Through our portfolio of leading enterprise software solutions, we ignite business performance for thousands of customers globally. We’re doing it in an entirely remote workplace that is focused on building teams of top talent and operating in a model that provides challenging opportunities and personal flexibility.
   

  

 A career with IgniteTech is challenging and fast-paced. We are always looking for energetic and enthusiastic employees to join our world-class team.
   

  

 We offer opportunities for personal contribution and promote career development. IgniteTech is an Affirmative Action, Equal Opportunity Employer that values the strength that diversity brings to the workplace.
   

  

 There is so much to cover for this exciting role, and space here is limited. Hit the Apply button if you found this interesting and want to learn more. We look forward to meeting you!
   

  

**Working with Crossover**
 This is a full-time (40 hours per week), long-term position. The position is immediately available and requires entering into an independent contractor agreement with Crossover. The compensation level for this role is $50 USD/hour, which equates to $100,000 USD/year assuming 40 hours per week and 50 weeks per year. The payment period is weekly. Consult www.crossover.com/help-and-faqs for more details on this topic.
   

  

**What to expect next:**
* You will receive an email with a link to start your self-paced, online job application.
* Our hiring platform will guide you through a series of online “screening” assessments to check for basic job fit, job-related skills, and finally a few real-world job-specific assignments.


**Important!** 
 If you do not receive an email from us:
   

  

* First, emails may take up to 15 minutes to send, refresh and check again.
* Second, check your spam and junk folders for an email from Crossover.com, mark as “Not Spam” since you will receive other emails as well.
* Third, we will send to whatever email account you indicated on the Apply form - by default, that is the email address you use as your LinkedIn username and it might be different than the one you have already checked.
* If all else fails, just reset your password by visiting https://www.crossover.com/auth/password-recovery if you already applied using LinkedIn EasyApply.


 Crossover Job Code: LJ-5266-SE-Stockhol-EnterpriseAcco

title: Modern Workplace Engineer | Microsoft 365
description:
Unlock the potential of Microsoft 365 as a visionary engineer, transforming challenges into cutting-edge solutions. Embrace continuous learning and collaborate with global teams to shape the future of technology-driven excellence. Join us at Avanade, where creativity, innovation, and career growth thrive.
   

  

**Come join us**
 Are you passionate about helping partners realize the value of a Modern Workplace? So are we!
   

  

 Avanade Sweden is looking for a Modern Workplace Engineer who will use their experience in Microsoft 365 suite including collaboration, device management, and security components to provide a truly cost-efficient, responsive, and secure evergreen Modern Workplace to our valued clients. You thrive on transforming business challenges into powerful solutions, and your attention to detail sets you apart. Embrace your passion for continuous learning and seize the opportunity to deliver top-tier results under pressure. Join us as we shape the future with technology-driven excellence!
 **Together we do what matters.**
**Skills And Experiences**
 You have previous experience with:
   

  

* Microsoft 365
* Collaboration tools such as SharePoint online, Teams
* Modern Device management with Intune/SCCM
* Understanding of security components in Entra ID, Purview and Defender suite
* Windows 365 and Azure Virtual Desktop
* Windows 11 and mobile operating systems


 Office 365
   

  

* Other experience includes:
* PowerShell and other scripting language
* Up-to-date knowledge of Microsoft products


**About You**
 You’re a natural communicator who wants to help our partners on their Modern Workplace journey. You will help improve employee mobility, efficiency, teamwork, and security demonstrating your experience in Microsoft 365 suite. Your interpersonal and communication skills help technical and non-technical clients engage with often complex information.
   

  

**Characteristics That Can Spell Success For This Role Are**
* Embrace challenges with a keen intellect and a thirst for knowledge.
* Collaborate seamlessly, fostering open and effective communication.
* Embrace creativity and explore groundbreaking solutions.
* Stay ahead of the curve, anticipating what lies ahead and adapting to the latest advancements


**What You'll Do**
 As a
 *Modern Workplace Engineer* 
 , your focus is on Workplace Services including desktop solutions, collaboration technologies, Voice solutions and enablement of secure remote working environments.
   

  

 Day-to-day, you will make upgrades, migrations, and evergreen scenarios. You translate business requirements into technical solutions using Microsoft 365 products, driving their implementations in enterprise environments. You collaborate with cross-functional teams under challenging circumstances to deliver high-quality solutions, manage task backlog for continuous improvement and share best-practices with Global Avanade Team members. Additionally, you apply your expertise in technical and consulting knowledge to advise clients on accurate governance to ensure stability, and to enable them to evolve their environments to support changing business requirements.
   

  

**Learn more**
 To learn more about the types of projects our Modern Workplace team works on check out these case studies:
   

  

* Why now is the time to modernize your communications capabilities
* Workplace experience: Why evergreen is everything


 Interested in knowing what’s going on inside Avanade? Check out our blogs:
   

  

* Avanade Insights – exchange ideas that drive tomorrow’s innovation
* Inside Avanade – explore what life is like working at Avanade


**Enjoy your career**
 Some of the best things about working at Avanade
   

  

* Opportunity to work for Microsoft’s Global Alliance Partner of the Year (14 years in a row), with exceptional development and training (minimum 80 hours per year for training and paid certifications)
* Real-time access to technical and skilled resources globally
* Dedicated career advisor to encourage your growth
* Engaged and helpful coworkers genuinely interested in you


**Benefits**
 Find out more about some of our benefits here.
   

  

**A great place to work**
 As you bring your skills and abilities to Avanade, you’ll get distinctive experiences, limitless learning, and ambitious growth in return. As we continue to build our diverse and inclusive culture, we become even more innovative and creative, helping us better serve our clients and communities. You’ll join a community of smart, supportive collaborators to lift, mentor, and guide you, and to lean on your expertise. You get a company purpose-built for business-critical, leading-edge technology solutions, committed to improving the way humans work, interact, and live. It’s all here, so take a closer look! T
 **ogether we do what matters** 
 .
   

  

 We work hard to provide an inclusive, diverse culture with a deep sense of belonging for all our employees. Visit our Inclusion & Diversity page.
   

  

 Create a future for our people that focuses on
   

  

* Expanding your thinking
* Experimenting courageously
* Learning and pivoting


 Inspire greatness in our people by
   

  

* Empowering every voice
* Encouraging boldness
* Celebrating progress


 Accelerate the impact of our people by
   

  

* Amazing the client
* Prioritizing what matters
* Acting as one

title: Microsoft 365 Strateg, Enterprise Applications
description:
**Nexer Worklife är ledande inom Microsoft 365- och SharePoint-lösningar och söker nu en Microsoft 365-specialist. Vi hjälper våra kunder att maximera potential genom teknisk utveckling och strategi med fokus på slutanvändaren. Vi hanterar hela den digitala arbetsplatsen, från forskning till support. Bli en del av vårt växande team och ansök idag för att forma framtidens digitala arbetsplats!**
**Hur ser rollen ut?**
 Som Microsoft 365-specialist ökar du kunders affärsvärde genom effektiv användning av Microsoft 365. Du förenklar det dagliga arbetet, stärker teamsamarbetet och höjer produktiviteten genom att stödja kunder med verktyg som Teams, SharePoint och Copilot för Microsoft 365. För att lyckas i rollen behöver du ha insikt i affärsprocesser och trender inom digitala arbetsplatser.
   

  

 Arbetet innebär att du:
   

  

* Förklarar hur verktygen kan underlätta arbetsprocesser genom workshops och utbildning.
* Bistår kunden med strategisk rådgivning gällande Microsoft 365.
* Identifierar och analyserar kunders arbetssätt, behov och mål.
* Kartlägger och skapar strategier för den digitala arbetsplatsen, inklusive implementeringsplaner och informationsarkitektur.
* Assisterar med styrning och migration.
* Hanterar projekt relaterade till den digitala arbetsplatsen.
* Intar rollen som lösningsarkitekt, beroende på din profil.
* Driver förändring inom organisationen.


**Vem är du?** 
  

  

 Du har ett intresse för digitala arbetsplatslösningar och erfarenhet av att stödja verksamheter med digitala verktyg samt agera som rådgivare. Du har utmärkta kommunikationsförmågor, trivs med att driva förändring, och leder projekt både på svenska och engelska.
   

  

 Du behöver också:
   

  

* Djupgående erfarenhet av att implementera och optimera Microsoft 365-lösningar.
* Kunskap om Microsoft-infrastruktur.
* Strategisk och praktisk kunskap om att implementera teknologilösningar.
* En vilja att ständigt hålla dig uppdaterad med vad som händer i Microsoft 365 för att kunna ge dina kunder de bästa råden för deras verksamhet.


**Vad kan vi erbjuda dig?** 
  

  

* Balans mellan arbete och fritid, med möjlighet att påverka ditt arbeta och vardag samt arbeta med både korta och långa uppdrag.
* En flexibel arbetspolicy, med möjlighet att arbeta hemifrån när det passar dig och ditt team.
* Kompetensutveckling
* Ett stöttande team och en organisation som genomsyras av en familjekänsla och mångfald.
* Möjlighet att delta i Corporate Social Responsibility (CSR)-arbete, till exempel genom Star for Life, Pink Programming eller Nexer Network Women.
* En rolig arbetsplats där vi älskar att hitta på saker tillsammans. Vi har bl.a. regelbundna spelkvällar och träningsutmaningar!


**Hur är det att arbeta p** 
**å Nexer?**
 Worklife är en del av Nexer Enterprise Applications. Vi har en familjär kultur med en bra sammanhållning i teamen. Arbetsmiljön genomsyras av en kamratlig stämning och ett nära ledarskap. Vi är ett välbekant namn när det gäller Microsoft Dynamics och Microsoft 365 inom Sverige och över hela världen. Du får möjlighet att arbeta inom Sverige och även globalt eftersom det är där våra kunder finns. Vi erbjuder en unik kombination av den stora organisationens stabilitet och den lilla verksamhetens möjlighet att påverka och få saker att hända.
   

  

 Vi har en stark vilja att driva affärer och firar våra framgångar genom regelbundna events, resor och konferenser. Här kan du läsa mer om oss: https://nexergroup.com/careerhub/come-on-in-nexer-ea/
   

  

  

  

**Vilka är Nexer Group?**
 Som anställd på Nexer får du en djärv och entreprenöriell arbetsgivare med internationell närvaro. Vi är stolta över att leda den digitala revolutionen och ligga i teknikens framkant, alltid med ett agilt och framåtblickande förhållningssätt. Hos oss får du unika möjligheter att drömma stort, agera smart och utvecklas. Som familjeföretag äger vi vår strategi och investerar i långsiktiga mål, och vi uppmuntrar medarbetarnas engagemang och idéer.
   

  

  

  

**Ansökan**
 Du är varmt välkommen att skicka in din ansökan nedan. Vi har tyvärr ingen möjlighet att ta emot ansökningar via e-post, men har du frågor om tjänsten eller Nexer får du gärna höra av dig till Maja Åström på maja.astrom@nexergroup.com. Vi hanterar ansökningarna löpande, så vänta inte med att söka!

title: Utvecklare med kunskap inom Microsoft 365/SharePoint
description:
**Om rollen** 




 Diwo söker en utvecklare som har erfarenhet av att arbeta med Microsoft 365/SharePoint/Azure. Du kommer att vara del av ett team som levererar skräddarsydda lösningar för våra kunders behov. Du har goda kunskaper inom dessa teknologier och kan utveckla både front- och backend.
 



 Du är en driven och ansvarsfull person som trivs med att samarbeta med andra. Du har ett analytiskt och kreativt tänkande och kan skriva kod av hög kvalitet. Hos oss får du möjlighet att arbeta i en stimulerande och utvecklande miljö där du får bidra till att skapa värde för våra kunder. Du kommer också att agera som teknisk expert och rådgivare för våra kunder och produkter.
 



*Om du vill vara med och skapa moderna lösningar som utmanar det möjliga, då är du välkommen till vårt team!* 




  





  





**Kvalifikationer** 



* 5 års erfarenhet av utveckling front- och backend
* 2 års erfarenhet av utveckling mot Microsoft SharePoint, Microsoft Azure och Microsoft 365 plattformen
* Utmärkt kommunikationsförmåga på både svenska och engelska



**Meriterande** 



* Konsultkompetens och social förmåga samt erfarenhet av presale
* Erfarenhet av dokumentation och säker kodhantering
* Erfarenhet av Microsofts olika ramverk för utveckling (SPFx, MS Graph, PNP, Fabric)
* Erfarenhet av SharePoint-utveckling, Powershell samt Powerplatform
* Erfarenhet av att ta fram konceptuella och tekniska lösningsförslag baserat på både kravspecifikation och identifierade kundbehov
* Erfarenhet av estimering och konceptutveckling för lösningar
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta med SharePoint Online, Microsoft Azure samt Microsoft 365
* Erfarenhet av att utveckla SharePoint-lösningar med hjälp av .NET, C#, JavaScript, React, HTML och CSS
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta med SharePoint API:er och web-services



  





**Diwo erbjuder** 



* Spännande projekt och möjligheten att arbeta med senaste tekniken
* Konkurrenskraftig lön och förmåner
* Möjlighet att arbeta flexibelt med moderna verktyg

title: Data Engineer
description:
**Data Engineer** 




  





 locations: Stockholm
 



  





 time type: Full time
 



  





 posted 6 Days Ago
 



  





 job requisition id: J123337
 



  





  





**Det här är vi** 




 För oss kommer människan alltid först. Och tekniken först därefter. Du ska alltid kunna vara uppkopplad med de och det som betyder mest för just dig. Vår övertygelse är att uppkopplade samhällen är starkare samhällen. Som en Telenor-medarbetare kommer du att vara en viktig pusselbit av en större internationell organisation som vill skapa samhällsnytta genom att leverera förstklassig uppkoppling i de samhällen vi verkar.
 



  





 Telenor genomgår just nu en digital transformation där vi snabbt strävar efter en helt datastyrd framtid. För att stödja denna satsning investerar vi mycket i området Analytics. Vi letar nu efter en Data Engineer som vill vara en del av denna spännande resa och gå med i vårt Data & Analytics-team.
 



  





**Vad du kommer att göra** 




 Du kommer att vara en del av vårt Data & Analytics team inom Data, Analytics och Automation organisationen. Vi letar nu efter en passionerad Data Engineer som tillsammans med sitt team vill arbeta med att skapa datadrivna beslut och bidra till att driva värde genom data.
 



  





 I rollen som Data Engineer kommer tillsammans med dina kollegor utveckla lösningar i vår analyticsmiljö och i en agil miljö säkerställa att vi skapar värde för organisationen på bästa möjliga sätt. Du kommer vara en del av olika projekt och samarbeta med kollegor inom såväl det tekniska som affärsnära. Vi tror på samarbete och kontinuerligt lärande. Därför kommer du att få möjlighet att lära dig av dina kollegor och dela med dig av din kunskap med andra, för att tillsammans kunna skapa de bästa möjliga resultaten.
 



  





**Vem du är** 




 För att lyckas i rollen som Data Engineer har du relevant utbildningsbakgrund och tidigare erfarenhet inom områden som Data Engineer eller liknande roll i Data Lakemiljö.
 



  





 Vi tror också att du har:
 


* Erfaren inom SQL, Python, Java, Qlik Sense/Qlik Cloud, Spark, Airflow, ETL/ELT
* Erfaren inom cloud services AWS eller GCP
* Erfarenhet av statistics
* Bakgrund inom telekombranschen är ett stort plus
* Flytande i svenska och engelska
* Självgående, samarbetsvillig och lösningsorienterad



  





**Vårt löfte** 




 Nyckeln till vår framgång är en balanserad arbetskraft. För att säkra det arbetar vi aktivt för att främja en arbetsmiljö där våra anställda får stöd och egenmakt inom alla sina arbetsområden. Vi lovar dig ett mänskligt företag som har hög vilja till självförbättring och att snabbt anpassa sig till en digitaliserad värld.
 



  





 Du välkomnas varmt in till ett skickligt team av professionella kolleger och utöver detta erbjuder vi även:
 



  




* Ett flexibelt arbetssätt. Vi tror på att flexibiliteten och friheten att välja var och när du levererar i ditt arbete bidrar till ökad prestation, engagemang och balans i livet. Vi tror också på styrkan i att vi är bättre tillsammans och att teamandan utvecklas när vi möts och interagerar med varandra, därför ser vi att våra kontor ska agera som magneter för samarbete, kreativitet och företagsanda.
* Utbildningsprogram så att du som medarbetare kan fördjupa din kunskap och bredda kompetensen.
* Ett generöst hälsovårdspaket innehållandes exempelvis ”give me a break-days”, friskvårdsbidrag, tjänstepension och mycket mer.



  





**Sök till oss idag** 




 Om du tycker att det här låter intressant och vill höra mer, vänligen kontakta Marta Jagebro, marta.jagebro@telenor.se. Skicka inte din cv via mail, dessa kommer inte att utvärderas.
 



  





 Sista ansökningsdagen: vi arbetar löpande så sök idag!
 



 Placeringsort: Stockholm
 



  





*Note!* 




*Urval och vidare steg kommer genomföras i augusti.* 




  





**Bra att känna till** 




 Enligt Telenors policy genomför vi bakgrundskontroll på slutkandidat för samtliga rekryteringar.

title: Cisco Collaboration Engineer
description:
**Position Summary**
 The Cisco Collaboration Engineer’s role within IT Service Delivery is to plan, design, build, install, configure, manage, secure, document, and support the systems within Data Center, Distribution Center, Public and Private Cloud environments, providing resilient, and scalable IT Services to support a fast-growing company.
   

  

 This role will be focused on the Cisco voice infrastructure, and will be responsible for developing, implementing, and documenting best practices and standards aimed at optimizing the VOIP infrastructure. The Collaboration Engineer will provide technical expertise, with ability to work on multiple projects and issues simultaneously, focusing on operational excellence and continuous improvement activities for Global IT Operations through ITIL based IT Service Management processes and procedures.
   

  

 The successful candidate must have excellent customer service, written, and verbal communication skills, and must be able to work collaboratively across multiple departments, business partners, and suppliers to meet operational performance and reliability targets. This role is critical in ensuring we collectively achieve our IT collaboration strategy: Enabling business & employee success through IT services that anticipate demand and simply work, anywhere, anytime.
   

  

**Position Responsibilities May Include, But Not Limited To**
* Provide end to end ownership and accountability for the service delivery, maintenance, and support of the global VOIP infrastructure of Client, and performance of the managed service provider(s).
* Managing telephony migrations from on-premise CUCM into Cisco Cloud (Webex Calling).
* Design, build, manage, optimize, support, and maintain the Client Holdings global enterprise VOIP environment including, but not limited to: CUCM, SIP CUBE, Webex Calling and Contact Center.
* Based on industry-best standards, develop and maintain technical standards and system configuration documentation, physical and logical diagrams, knowledge base articles, and runbooks for the proper transition of services to external managed service providers.
* Responsible for software and hardware upgrades relating to the Cisco voice infrastructure, including EOL/EOS refresh as part of life cycle management, ongoing security patching and vulnerability remediation according to established standards.
* Proactively and reactively identify and remediate voice and video performance issues and act as escalation point to review and resolve technical issues through completion, including root cause analysis and corrective actions.
* Provide Tier 3 technical expertise and support relating to Cisco voice infrastructure, and act as escalation point for the IT Service Center to review and resolve technical issues through completion, including root cause analysis and corrective actions.
* Participate in an on-call rotation to provide operational support as needed, which may include off hours.
* Adhere to and participate in the current and future IT Service Management processes including, but not limited to incident, problem, and change control procedures.
* Other projects or duties as assigned.


**Required Skills And Experience**
* Bachelor’s degree in any field and 1+ years working experience and proficiency with planning, designing, supporting, maintaining, and LAN/WAN/VoIP communications, network hardware such as Cisco routers, Ethernet switches, access points voice gateways & firewalls.
* OR 3+ years of on-the-job experience in these areas in lieu of bachelor’s degree.
* Experience with supporting technologies such as Cisco Voice technologies to include the following: Cisco Unified Communications Manager (CUCM), Cisco Unity Connection (CUC), Cisco Unified Contact Center Express (CUCCX), Cisco Unified Communications Manager IM & Presence, and Cisco Unified Border Element (CUBE), Cisco Expressway, Cisco Video System, and Webex Control Hub and suite.
* Experience with Voice related protocols (SIP, RTP/SRTP, SDP, MGCP, SCCP etc.); SIP/PSTN Design and Voice Gateway Configuration. Detailed knowledge and understanding of telephony/UC protocols, H323, SIP, T38, TLS and Codecs
* Familiar with technology such as: Wireless (WiFi) 802.11 a/b/g/n technologies, Network security/VPN/SSL technologies, such as Cisco, Palo Alto, Cisco Nexus platforms
* Knowledge of network architecture and maintenance, such as log analysis, backup/recovery, high availability, capacity planning, and DR/resiliency.
* Excellent English written and verbal communication skills.
* Strong technical support, problem solving, and critical thinking skills.
* Ability to collaborate effectively across teams in a high performing and matrixed team environment.


 Additional information
   

  

 The minimum gross wage according to the collective agreement (chemical industry) for your new job is EUR 3.909,67. We strive to adapt your salary to your range of tasks and to your profile, which is why we are ready to pay wages higher than collectively agreed. This is a legal requirement in Austria which is not applicable for other sites.

title: Account Manager till Varnish Software
description:
Drömmer du om att driva försäljning och bygga starka kundrelationer inom den digitala världen? Varnish Software söker en engagerad Account Manager till deras team i Stockholm. Bli en del av deras resa och revolutionera webbprestanda!
 



  

**Företag :**
 Varnish Software AB
 



  

**Plats :**
 Stockholm
 



  

**Jobbkategori :**
 Försäljning
 



  

**Omfattning :**
 Heltid
 



  

**Startdatum :**
 Enligt överenskommelse
 



  

**Typ av uppdrag :**
 Rekrytering
   




**Om tjänsten**

 Som Account Manager på Varnish Software kommer du att spela en nyckelroll i att driva nyförsäljning och vårda befintliga kundrelationer inom Norden. Dina huvudsakliga ansvarsområden inkluderar att identifiera och förvärva nya kunder, hantera SME- och stora konton samt nå tydliga försäljningsmål. Du kommer att resa för att träffa kunder och samarbeta med ett dedikerat team för att leverera exceptionella lösningar inom innehållsleverans.
 


  


  

**Du erbjuds**



  

  
* Ett utmanande jobb med möjligheter till personlig utveckling.
  
* Balans mellan arbete och privatliv med möjlighet att anpassa arbetstider efter dina behov.
  
* En spännande och utvecklande arbetsmiljö.
  

  


**Arbetsuppgifter**
  
* Hantera och utveckla relationer med befintliga kunder för att säkerställa tillfredsställelse och lojalitet.
  
* Driva försäljningen mot specifika mål och kvoter.
  
* Leda försäljningsprocessen från prospektering till avslut.
  
* Genomföra regelbundna kundmöten och presentationer.
  
* Samarbeta med tvärfunktionella team, inklusive Solutions Engineers och Deployment Engineers.
  
* Övervaka marknadstrender och konkurrentaktiviteter för att identifiera nya affärsmöjligheter.
  

  


**Vi söker dig som**
  
* Gedigen erfarenhet av försäljning, specifikt inom SME- och stora konton.
  
* Dokumenterad erfarenhet av att leda försäljningsprocesser från start till mål.
  
* Självdriven och affärsinriktad, med starka organisatoriska färdigheter.
  
* Erfarenhet av komplex programvaruförsäljning, helst inom fintech-sektorn.
  
* Flytande i svenska och engelska; andra nordiska språk är meriterande.
  
* Möjlighet att resa för kundmöten.
  


  


  

**För att lyckas i rollen har du följande personliga egenskaper:**



  

  
* Målmedveten
  
* Social
  
* Ordningsam
  
* Ansvarstagande
  


  

  

**Vår rekryteringsprocess**
  


 Denna rekryteringsprocess hanteras av Academic Work och vår kunds önskemål är att alla frågor rörande tjänsten skickas till Academic Work.
 


  


 Vi tillämpar löpande urval och kommer plocka ner annonsen när tillräckligt många kandidater har nått slutskedet i rekryteringsprocessen. Rekryteringsprocessen innehåller två urvalstest: ett personlighetstest och ett test i kognitiv förmåga. Testerna är ett verktyg för att kunna hitta den kandidat med högst potential för tjänsten samt främja jämlikhet, mångfald och en rättvis rekryteringsprocess.
   




**Varnish Software AB**

 Varnish Software är en ledande leverantör av avancerade lösningar för webbacceleration och innehållsleverans. Deras innovativa teknik hjälper företag världen över att förbättra webbplatsens prestanda, förbättra användarupplevelsen och effektivt skala sin digitala närvaro. Med en mängd produkter och tjänster, inklusive Varnish Cache, Varnish Enterprise och Varnish Controller, möjliggör de för organisationer att leverera blixtsnabb innehållsleverans, minska serverbelastningen och hantera hög trafikvolym enkelt.
   




**Bli direktrekryterad till Varnish Software AB**

 Detta är en direktrekrytering, vilket betyder att den kandidat som får tjänsten blir direktanställd av kundföretaget. Rekryteringsprocessen hanteras av Academic Work.
   




**Har du frågor om tjänsten?**

 Mikaela Hofstedt eller någon av kollegorna i rekryteringsteamet svarar dig gärna på stv3@academicwork.se Ange annons-ID i ditt mail: 15106359

title: Marketing Automation Lead
description:
**Söker du efter en roll där du som senior MA-specialist får möjligheten att bidra med strategisk höjd i en transformationsresa inom martech på PwC? Vill du bidra till ökat affärsvärde och tillväxt genom din tekniska kompetens inom Salesforce Marketing Cloud? Vi hoppas på det! Nu söker vi dig som har flera års erfarenhet av marketing automation och mycket god förståelse för helheten inom martech och den tekniska infrastrukturen. Läs vidare nedan och skicka in din ansökan redan idag.**
 Placering för den här rollen är i Stockholm och du kommer att vara en del av Client & Market Development (CMD) som är PwC:s avdelning för marknad, kommunikation och sälj. Du kommer att arbeta i nära samarbete med ditt team inom avdelningen (kampanj, CRM, sälj, analys mfl.) och med lokala IT. I rollen kommer du även ha många globala kontakter inom PwC-nätverket där du till exempel kravställer och driver lokala initiativ, hämtar information om nyheter och nya funktioner.
   

  

 I rollen som Marketing Automation Lead kommer du att arbeta med Salesforce Marketing Cloud och främst ur ett tekniskt perspektiv. Ditt ansvarsområde inkluderar att säkerställa att nuvarande processer är effektiva samt att främja vidareutvecklingen för en optimal kundupplevelse. Vi ser också att du med din erfarenhet är en skicklig kravställare mot lokala IT och Globala Salesforce teamet. Dessutom har du en god förståelse för Martechlandskapet och de olika systemens påverkan till varandra. Självklart intresserar det dig att granska och förstå information som rör våra kunders data. Du är en kreativ problemlösare som ihärdigt söker lösningar på komplexa problem. Vi ser att du med din tidigare erfarenhet bidrar i arbetet med att skapa och utveckla våra automatiserade flöden och kunddialoger. Som superuser är det då viktigt att du kan och vill sprida kunskap om möjligheterna och potentialen i Salesforce Marketing Cloud.
   

  

 Ytterligare exempel på där vi ser att du som specialist kan bidra:
   

  

* Säkerställa teknisk funktionalitet och främja utveckling
* Bearbeta kunddata och skapa målgrupper
* Stötta processen och identifiera leads (MQL/SQL)
* Ta fram fördjupad statistik, uppföljning och optimera mot målsättningar
* Utveckla nya kommunikationsflöden som stöttar affären
* Bidra med systemkunskap i större satsningar tillsammans med andra specialister
* Hantera, optimera och övervaka pågående automationer
* Ta fram resultat utifrån uppsatta mål och riktmärken och delar insikter i syfte att optimera framtida kommunikationer.


 ,
   

  

**Dina personliga egenskaper**
 Du är en teknisk- och systemorienterad medarbetare som fungerar bra i grupp och är bra på att engagera andra. Din förmåga att generera idéer och engagemanget inom din expertis är framträdande. Som en del av arbetsuppgifterna ingår det att tillämpa systematiskt tänkande och en förståelse för arbetsflöden för att effektivt överföra organisationsstrategier till kundorienterade systemlösningar. Du är bra på att bygga tillitsfulla relationer, lyhörd och prestigelös. Givetvis ser vi även att du har ett genuint intresse för teknik inom martech och dess möjligheter samt att du tycker att kunddata och analys är en del av vardagen.
   

  

**Bakgrund och kompetens**
* Minst 5 års erfarenhet av Marketing Automation
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta med MA-strategi och Customer loyalty program
* Erfarenhet av relevant plattform som exempelvis Salesforce Marketing Cloud
* HTML/CSS/SQL, meriterande med JS
* Analys av kunddata/skapa målgruppsselektioner
* God förståelse för helheten inom martech och den tekniska infrastrukturen
* Datadriven kundkommunikation i processer
* Webb/e-postdesign och optimering
* Marknadsföring i digitala kanaler


 Den formella rekryteringsprocessen börjar i augusti, efter semestern. Det är önskvärt att du kan börja så snart som möjligt men anpassar oss till din tillgänglighet. För mer information om tjänsten är du välkommen att kontakta Åsa Franzén Isaksson, Marketing Manager på asa.x.franzen.isaksson@pwc.com och om du har frågor om rekryteringsprocessen kontakta ansvarig rekryterare Hasse Karlberg på hasse.karlberg@pwc.com.
   

  

 Varmt välkommen med din ansökan!

title: Project Control Engineer
description:
***Vill du vara med och jobba i Bravidas större och mer komplexa projekt? Får du energi av omväxling och snabbt tempo i en vänlig miljö? Hos oss får du frihet under ansvar att överträffa förväntningar genom din kunskap, ditt driv och intresse. Nu söker Bravida en driven och strukturerad Project Control Engineer till vårt ProjectManagementOffice där stora och komplexa projekt som Förbifart Stockholm och Nya tunnelbanan ingår. Är du redo för din nästa utmaning i din karriär?***
***Om jobbet***
 Som Project Control Engineer ansvarar du för att stödja och underlätta styrning, övervakning och rapportering av projektens framsteg, kostnader och tidsramar. Du assisterar vid utvecklingen och underhållet av projektplaner och tidscheman samt assisterar vid tilldelning och hantering av projektresurser. I tjänsten ansvarar du för att säkerställa att resurserna används effektivt och optimeras för att uppnå projektens mål. Du kommer att arbeta nära Project Control Lead och projektstyrningschefen för PMO.
   

  

 Dina arbetsuppgifter kommer bland annat bestå av att:
   

  

* Förbereda och leverera regelbundna rapporter om projektets framsteg och prestanda till relevanta intressenter
* Stödja vid genomförandet av kvalitetskontroller och säkerställa att projektet följer fastställda kvalitetsstandarder och processer
* Kommunicera med projektteamet och andra berörda parter om projektens status


 Andra arbetsuppgifter än ovan förekommer i projekten, det krävs därav en flexibilitet i rollen
 **.** 
 Du kommer att utgå från Bravidas huvudkontor på Mikrofonvägen i Hägersten, men kommer även vara lokalt närvarande på våra projekt när det krävs, vilket innebär att vissa resor ingår i tjänsten. Rollen innebär inget ansvar över budget- och resultat eller personal.
   

  

**Vem är du?**
 Vi söker dig som är civilingenjör eller högskoleingenjör inom ingenjörsvetenskap, projektledning, ekonomi eller motsvarande utbildning. Du har minst 2 års arbetslivserfarenhet från stora och komplexa projekt kopplat till projektstyrning och projektledning. Vidare ser vi att du är bevandrad med projektstyrningsverktyg samt metoder och har goda kunskaper i inom Microsoft Office. Du kommunicerar obehindrat på svenska och engelska i både tal och skrift. Det är meriterande om du har kunskaper bland annat inom SharePoint Web Parts, Power Automate, Power BI, Primavera/Powerproject, hantering av Autodesk Construction Cloud och/eller VBA-programmering.
   

  

 Som person har du ett stort driv, engagemang och noggrannhet i ditt arbetssätt. Du är självgående och trivs att jobba efter ett tydligt strukturellt ramverk. Vidare ser vi gärna att du har en analytisk förmåga, är kommunikativ och har lätt för att skapa och bibehålla goda relationer med kollegor och kunder.
   

  

**Bravida som arbetsgivare**
 Bravida är en stor arbetsgivare – faktiskt störst inom vår bransch i Norden. Det gör att vi kan erbjuda mycket till dig som medarbetare. I flera år i rad har vi blivit rankade till en av Sveriges bästa arbetsgivare! Bravida eftersträvar mångfald och värdesätter en jämn könsfördelning. Vi arbetar som ett team och vi tycker om att skapa stora resultat, tillsammans.
   

  

 Förutom förmåner som exempelvis friskvårdsbidrag, hälsoundersökning och förmånliga försäkringar erbjuder Bravida dig ett självständigt och stimulerande arbete i en organisation där kompetens, utveckling och trivsel värderas högt. Vi på Bravida är vana att leverera högsta kvalitét till nöjda kunder och värnar om arbetsglädje likväl som en bra arbetsmiljö.
   

  

 Läs gärna mer om Vårt erbjudande och hur du kan utvecklas hos oss.
 **När du växer, växer vi!**
**Hur söker jag jobbet?**
 Ansökningar hanteras löpande och tjänsten kan komma att tillsättas innan sista ansökningsdatum som är
 **2024-09-16** 
 . Du skickar in ditt CV och personliga brev genom att klicka på knappen Ansök nedan.
   

  

*Vi undanber oss kontakt med rekryteringsföretag i denna rekryteringsprocess*

title: Senior Full-Stack Developer (Python/React)
description:
**Senior Full-Stack Developer – Stockholm, Hybrid** 




 Are you passionate about building innovative software solutions for the energy sector in a consultancy environment? Want to play a key role in developing cutting-edge applications for a diverse client base, where you'll tackle complex data optimisation challenges and create impactful products across the full stack?
 



  





**What's in it for you?** 




 You'll join a dynamic team of software engineers and data scientists, specialising in custom product development for the energy industry. Your role will span both backend and frontend development (split about 80/20 towards the backend), allowing you to contribute across the entire stack.
 



  





 Enjoy a flexible hybrid work model, balancing office time in Stockholm with remote work. You'll engage in projects of various scales, collaborating with cross-functional teams and interfacing directly with clients to deliver tailored solutions.
 



  





 You’ll get a competitive salary offering up to 70,000 SEK per month (depending on your experience).They are committed to professional growth, with plans to offer clear paths to leadership roles as the company expands. With ambitious growth plans, there's potential for advancement to senior technical positions in the future. On top of this you’ll get 30 days vacation, a health and wellness allowance (friskvård) and private pension contribution.
 



  





**What you'd be doing?** 




 You'll typically work in agile teams of 5-6 people, sometimes scaling up for larger projects. You might spearhead new initiatives, assessing client needs and building your team from within the company.
 



  





 Your work will involve developing sophisticated data infrastructure, implementing machine learning components, and creating robust APIs. You'll use a modern tech stack including cloud services, containerisation, and message brokers.
 



  





 On the frontend, you'll craft user interfaces ranging from analytical dashboards to complex 3D visualisations, using cutting-edge web technologies to create responsive and data-rich applications.
 



  





**About you?** 




 You have at least 5 years of experience in full-stack development, with a strong backend focus, preferably in Python including frameworks such as FastAPI, Django, RabbitMQ & Kafka. On the frontend, they work with modern JavaScript frameworks such as React, so experience here would also be essential.
 



  





 You're passionate about clean, efficient code and stay current with emerging technologies. Adaptability is key, as you'll work across various domains and tech stacks.
 



 Experience with DevOps practices, cloud platforms and familiarity with data processing and machine learning tools is a plus.
 



  





 Consultant-style experience is beneficial, as client interaction is a significant part of the role and fluency in both Swedish and English is a must for effective client communication.
 



  





**A bit about them?** 




 A growing tech consultancy in Stockholm, specialising in software solutions for the energy sector. They partner with both established industry leaders and innovative startups, focusing on data-driven applications that promote sustainability.
 



  





 The company culture emphasises collaboration, continuous learning, and making a positive impact in the green tech space. They're seeking motivated individuals who can drive technical discussions and align with their mission to create meaningful solutions in the energy sector.
 



  





 With a current team of about 45 and plans for significant growth, this role offers an exciting opportunity to be at the forefront of energy tech innovation in a rapidly expanding organization.
 



  





  





*Don't worry if your CV isn't up to date - just send me a message on LinkedIn or an email over to will@zebrapeople.com and we can go from there.* 




  





  





*3 stage Interview Process* 



1. *Initial Chat*
2. *Technical Discussion*
3. *Final with CEO*

title: Senior Product Manager, Angry Birds 2
description:
Rovio is part of the SEGA family and world famous for our flagship IP Angry Birds - want to know more about Rovio as an employer? Click here.
   

  

 Our Stockholm studio has built one of the largest comebacks in the gaming industry - Angry Birds 2! We take pride in our culture that helped make this game a success, where anything can be changed and everything is tested.
   

  

 We are now looking for a
 **Senior Product Manager** 
 to join the Angry Birds 2 team in our vibrant studio in the centre of Stockholm, Sweden.
   

  

 If you love building and improving F2P games based on deep player understanding, are passionate about data driven development, get excited about designing performant features, and would like to work and collaborate with uncommonly dedicated professionals - apply now!
   

  

 Not in Sweden? We provide relocation support.
   

  

 If you are already in Barcelona, you can also be located in our new studio here.
   

  

 You will have impact and fun at work by:
   

  

* Planning, prioritising, and running feature development efforts for an area of the game all while ensuring an outstanding player experience
* Driving improvements to business performance for both new and existing features based on your knowledge of engagement & monetization mechanics, player behaviour, and F2P game design
* Analysing the game metrics and proactively identifying and implementing optimizations to improve the player experience and core financial performance keeping in mind the needs of a mature F2P game
* Supporting the Game Lead by providing input on the strategic direction for Angry Birds 2 overall
* Being responsible for the A/B testing process helping to validate hypotheses and translating the results into actions that help steer our games into the right direction
* Constantly bringing an outside-in view and deep market expertise by benchmarking competitors and identifying new & promising practices from the leading games in the market


 Experience and skills we are looking for:
   

  

* Experience working as a Product Manager with live F2P mobile titles
* Deep understanding of F2P live-ops, economy, and game design and eagerness to learn about Angry Birds players
* Track record of crafting F2P features that drive increases to retention, engagement, and monetization
* Experience in tuning and balancing live-ops features to drive sustainable long-term performance
* Experience with defining strategy and the ability to translate overall strategy into a roadmap that creates product growth
* Strong analytical capabilities paired with the drive to analyse game data with the assistance of game analysts


 Please send your CV in English. We look forward to talking to you.
   

  

- 

 We welcome applicants to use the name they want to be addressed by in the application form, regardless of whether it is their legal name.
   

  

 At Rovio, we are also committed to providing reasonable accommodations for qualified individuals with disabilities or special needs in our working environment and job application procedures. We are committed to continuously improving workplace accessibility. If you have any questions before applying, please write to us at recruitment@rovio.com.
   

  

**What to expect when you join us**
**Meet the Rovians**
**About Rovio**
**Diversity, Equity and Inclusion at Rovio**

title: Field Service Engineer- Chemical Analysis Division
description:
**Work Schedule**


Standard (Mon-Fri)**Environmental Conditions**


Cleanroom: no hair products, jewelry, makeup, nail polish, perfume, exposed piercings, facial hair etc... allowed**Job Description**


When you’re part of Thermo Fisher Scientific, you’ll do exciting work within a team that values performance, quality and innovation. As part of a successful, growing global organization you will be encouraged to perform at your best. With revenues of more than $30 billion and the largest investment in R&D in the industry, we give our people the resources and opportunities to make significant contributions to the world.

**Division summary**
--------------------


The Chemical Analysis Division (CAD) provides a diverse mix of analytical instruments and associated services to a broad range of end user markets including Safety & Security, Environmental, Food Safety, Energy, Mining, Life Science Manufacturing and Recycling, to name a few. Its instruments are deployed in the field and on the line, in challenging environments where customers put a premium on robustness, reliability and ease of use. They allow them to make decisions where they operate and streamline their businesses. CAD is a complex division with a global footprint, broad product portfolio and diverse customer base.


The Production Process & Analytics (PPA) business is part of CAD. PPA has over 700 employees globally with historical revenues in excess of $200 million dollars.

**Location/Division Specific Information**
------------------------------------------


Within our EMEA Production Process & Analytics Business Unit we are looking for an expert and motivated Field Service Engineer primarily for one customer in the North of Sweden (Resident engineer) for the product line Gauging for Thickness and Basis Weight Measurement (Web link: www.thermofisher.com/gauging) and if required extending to other product lines and/or applications.


What you will do?

* Represent our company in a positive, professional manner in all dealings with Thermo Fisher Scientific customers, both external and internal.
* Own and deliver service commitments: provide field installations, repairs, data analysis and calibrations, preventative maintenance, training, radiation services, remote technical support, other field and remote services. (primarily on one customer site in North Sweden as resident engineer and sporadically within EMEA region when required).
* Responsible for providing services remotely or at site within agreed conditions; sets the accurate priorities.
* Service reporting, documentation and creation of protocols to specification on internal and customer needs.
* Maintain high level of customer allegiance by building strong customer relationships and promoting on excellent customer experience.
* Partner with our commercial colleagues to deliver customer deals that can be implemented profitably and meet/exceed customer expectations
* Help on continuous improvement through our Practical Process Improvement Business System
* Other duties and possible extension of business responsibilities as the needed

**How you will get here**
-------------------------


Education


Diploma or equivalent education preferable in electronic or electrical engineering.

**Experience**
--------------

* Three years of work experience in technical services
* One year field service experience (technical) or strong service knowledge
* Preferable material science and/or process engineering expertise/experience
* Preferable knowledge in Thickness and Basis Weight Measurement and/or Lithium Ion Batteries industrial process
* Outstanding solving skills, passionate about electromechanical, software and application issues


- Demonstrate Thermo Fisher Scientific values - Integrity, Intensity, Innovation and Involvement

**Knowledge, Skills, Abilities**
--------------------------------

* Excellent interpersonal communication both written and oral in English.
* The ability to speak German would be advantageous.
* Ability to work effectively with customers and colleagues in difficult and stressful situations
* Ability to understand, read and interpret technical drawings
* Customer friendliness and a professionalism
* PC literacy including MS Office, especially Excel, Word and Outlook
* Proficient in English, with a second language suited to region, Swedish is a plus
* Ability to travel, both domestic and internationally (mostly throughout EMEA region, and sporadically globally when required) 25 - 50%
* Valid driver's license
* Preferably experience with SalesForce CRM.


What we offer!

* Job with an innovative, forward-looking employer.
* Outstanding development and career prospects in a globally growing company.
* A culture based on integrity, dedication and innovation.
* Excellent training opportunities; attractive, comprehensive remuneration package and company benefits.


At Thermo Fisher Scientific, each one of our 70,000 extraordinary minds has a unique story to tell. Join us and contribute to our singular mission—enabling our customers to make the world healthier, cleaner and safer.

**Apply today! http://jobs.thermofisher.com**
---------------------------------------------
company_description: At Thermo Fisher Scientific, our professionals develop critical solutions—and build rewarding careers.

title: R&D Engineer - Transformer Large Core
description:
**Description**


A R&D engineer in the field of core technology leads activities to improve core mechanical and magnetic performance, core manufacturing methods while challenging the old routines to further developing a new better suited concept for future and current transformers. The role will work in close cooperation with experts in different transformer technology field as well as with transformer design and manufacturing specialists.


Working in R&D will give you the possibilities to use your creativity to solve a wide spectrum of challenges. You will have exciting and varied work in front of you where you will get a broad network internally and externally. Work with both the local factory and the global organization within Transformers and have career development opportunities as a Specialist or as a Project Manager.

**Your responsibilities**

* Creating conceptual designs of Transformer core to meet specified requirements (functional, technical, quality, etc…)
* Ability to create detailed design and 3D modeling as well as running mechanical verifications using simulation tools;
* Running Design for Excellence practices (DFA, DFM, FMEA, etc…)
* Preparing reports and related documents in accordance with internal and external requirements;
* Technical standards: Ensure that core-related processes and calculation methods are state of the art. Work with programmers to implement and test new methods in the design software.
* Technical support: Support the design, manufacturing, quality and supply chain organizations with technical expertise to ensure that technical requirements are fulfilled.
* Technical leadership and knowledge sharing: Coach and provide support and technical advice to colleagues on core-related topics. Maintain a network of engineering professionals to share best practices across different disciplines and locations.

**Your background**

* Master’s or Bachelor’s degree combined with work-life experience in Mechanical Engineering or equivalent;
* 3+ Years of experience in Design & Engineering
* Domain expertise in Power transformers is a plus.
* Fundamental knowledge of using different materials and manufacturing methods
* Understanding of electrical, magnetic and thermal phenomena.
* Advanced knowledge of 3D CAD software Creo/ProE.
* Fluent command of English, both written and spoken;

**What we offer**

* Collective agreement
* Flexible working time
* Health care and wellness allowance
* Fantastic career possibilities within Hitachi Energy both within Sweden and globally
* Mentor to support you throughout onboard phase
* Various trainings and education supporting employee development
* Diversified company with over 70+ nationalities working in Sweden
* Supplementary compensation for parental leave
* Employee Benefit Portal with thousands of discounts and perks
* More benefits could be connected to this specific role

**Additional information**


Are you ready for an exciting new challenge? Applications will be reviewed on an ongoing basis until 2nd of September, so don’t delay – apply today!


Recruiting Manager Karolina Czechowski, karolina.czechowski@hitachienergy.com, will answer your questions about the position. Union representatives – Sveriges Ingenjorer: Håkan Blomquist, +46 107-38 31 52, Unionen: Tomas L. Gustafsson, +46 107-38 27 47, Ledarna: Frank Hollstedt, +46 10 7387043 . All other questions can be directed to Lead Recruiter Gustaf Hedström, gustaf.hedstrom@hitachienergy.com

title: Maintenance Automation Engineer
description:
*At Tetra Pak we commit to making food safe and available, everywhere; and we protect what's good – protecting food, protecting people, and protecting the planet. By doing so we touch millions of people's lives every day.*

*And we need people like you to make it happen.*


***We empower you to reach your potential with opportunities to make an impact to be proud of – for food, people and the planet.***

  


**Job Summary**
---------------



We are a world leading food processing and packaging solutions company. Working closely with our customers and suppliers, we innovate to provide access to safe, nutritious food for hundreds of millions of people in more than 160 countries, while striving to reduce our environmental footprint.  

  

Within the department Packaging Solutions Additional Material, we are currently looking for an experienced Maintenance Automation Engineer to strengthen our capabilities in the field of automation. The local production support team consists of process engineers supported by a skilled maintenance team.  

  

At the factory in Fjällbacka, we are approximately 80 highly skilled employees, and we are really looking forward to welcoming another one. We work according to World Class Manufacturing (TPM) principles and have high level of operator autonomy in our teams.  

  

**Did you know that Fjällbacka is the only site in Tetra Pak worldwide that is producing plastic sealing strips and inside film for our packages?** This is a fantastic and unique opportunity to be part of this production – imagine being part of something so unique!  

  

This is a permanent position located in Fjällbacka on the beautiful Swedish west coast. In 1,5h drive by car, you will reach two major cities, Oslo in the north and Göteborg in the south. The great outdoor adventures are just outside the factory gate!  



**What you will do**
--------------------



As our new colleague, you will:


* Be responsible for Operational Technology (OT-Security).
* Be responsible for auxiliary equipment Life Cycle Management.
* Be technically responsible for our automation systems.
* Run automation improvement projects.
* Identify, analyse and solve automation issues in production machines.
* Support local projects with automation related security solutions.
* Develop and maintain standards and train operators.
**We believe you have**
-----------------------


* At least 5 years working experience as an Automation Engineer.
* A background in engineering and/or a technical degree in the field of automation.
* Good knowledge of automation systems in general and documented knowledge about:
	+ Siemens PLC (TIA & S7)
	+ Siemens Drives (Sinamics)
	+ Siemens HMI (WinCC/WinCC comfort)
* Profinet networks, hardware and software


Basic electrical training.  

Knowledge in CAD software, e.g. AutoCad EL, EPLAN, ELPROCAD or similar.  

Knowledge in improvement-, and problem solving (TPM/LEAN) analysis and tools.  

Good understanding of process parameters measurement and improvement techniques.  

Proficient English, written and spoken, good level of Swedish, written and spoken.  

To be successful in this role we believe you have a curious mindset with good collaboration and communication skills combined with solid strategic thinking. As a person you always have a positive attitude and like to work together with your colleagues. You have a drive to continuously develop yourself, to see others grow and gaining new knowledge. You like to work with and have experience of practical hands-on work in technical systems. With the base in Fjällbacka, we believe that you have at least drivers licence B.


**We Offer You**


* A variety of exciting challenges with ample opportunities for development and training in a truly global landscape
* A culture that pioneers a spirit of innovation where our industry experts drive visible results
* An equal opportunity employment experience that values diversity and inclusion
* Market competitive compensation and benefits with flexible working arrangements

  




**Apply Now**


If you are inspired to be part of our promise to protect what’s good; for food, people, and the planet, apply through our careers page at https://jobs.tetrapak.com/.


This job posting expires on **2024-09-02**


To know more about the position contact manager Christian Karlsson at +46 46 36 27 04  

Questions about your application contact Susanne Stålring at +46 46 36 3919  

For trade union information contact Sveriges Ingenjörer Lars Haraldsson at +46 46 36 2533 and Unionen Lisbeth Larsson at +46 46 36 2320

  


*Diversity, equity, and inclusion is an everyday part of how we work. We give people a place to belong and support to thrive, an environment where everyone can be comfortable being themselves and has equal opportunities to grow and succeed. We embrace difference, celebrate people for who they are, and for the diversity they bring that helps us better understand and connect with our customers and communities worldwide.*
company_description: At Tetra Pak we like a good challenge, and our promise is to make food safe and available everywhere.
